properties.name: bot.scheduler.chat.id
properties.description: Chat ID where scheduled messages will be send.

properties.name: bot.callback.timeout
properties.description: Timeout (in seconds) after which callback in the chat will be ignored.

properties.name: bot.message.timeout
properties.description: Timeout (in seconds) after which message in the chat will be ignored.

properties.name: bot.message.uniq.count
properties.description: Count of non-repeatable sticker messages from Bot.

properties.name: admin.users
properties.description: List of admin users (can run shell commands).
